page.title: 20Shopping
page.content: High Street and Broad Street are in the main shopping area.There is a total of 31 shops here,-13 being multi-stores and 18 privatly owned. Multi_stores include Boots,Fosters, WH Smith,Times Furnishing,Freeman Hardy & Willis(shoes),Stead & Simson(shoes), Radio Rentals(T.V),Woolworth,Wales Gas,Electricity,Lo-cost & Spar(food). Privatley owned shops include,Barry Waters(sports),Sparrow Wholefoods, Jones Butchers,Copper Kettle(fish & chips),Evans Cafe(bakers),Tegwyn Lloyd,H.B.Jones(confections),Lloyd & Lloyd,Roberts(Ironmongers),Daveys(Craf ts),Home Improvments(Paints and Wallpapers),Graham John(Shoes),Bonds Beauty Salon,Morgan Jewlers,Flower Pot(cut flowers),Eatons(clothes), Sagittarius(whole foods).The 3 main banks,Midland,Barclays & Nat West, together with many building societies.
